content: कृच्छ्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [<ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 2. 21</ls>] {@--1@} Causing trouble, painful; <ls>Ms. 6. 78.</ls> {@--2@} Bad, miserable, evil. {@--3@} Wicked, sinful. {@--4@} Being in a difficult or painful situation. --च्छ्रः , --च्छ्रं {@--1@} A difficulty, trouble, hardship, misery, calamity, danger; कृच्छ्रं महत्तीर्णः <ls>R. 14. 6</ls>; <ls n="R.">13. 77.</ls> {@--2@} Bodily mortification, penance, expiation; <ls>Ms. 4. 222</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">5. 21</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">11. 106.</ls> {@--3@} Torment, torture. {@--4@} A particular kind of religious penance (प्राजापत्य). --च्छ्रः Ischury. --च्छ्रं Sin. --च्छ्रं, कृच्छ्रेत्, कृच्छ्रास् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} With great difficulty, painfully, miserably; लब्धं कृच्छ्रेण रक्ष्यते <ls>H. 1. 185.</ls>
